name: Ludyrin's Mystics Academy
description:
Ludryin's Mystics Academy is a card game and visual novel about Dain, a student at an all-boys' magic school, who finds himself leading a team for a tournament he never signed up for.  

Play cards to best your opponents, and use those same cards to build bonds with your two teammates, Venry and Erian.  As your relationship gets stronger, so does your deck.  And maybe, after winning this tournament, you'll have more than just a trophy to take home....

  • 20+ cards, with two different sides each
  • 2 character endings
  • Play time: 1-2 hours

This game was created for the Yaoi Game Jam 2022.
